content: Hello! Welcome to BPI SaklAI. I'm here to help with your banking needs—whether it's checking your account, applying for a credit card, or anything else BPI-related.

suggestions.suggestion: Hello! Welcome to BPI SaklAI. I'm here to help with your banking needs—whether it's checking your account, applying for a credit card, or anything else BPI-related.

content: I want na mag-apply ng credit card sa BPI. What are the steps to avail yun?

To apply for a BPI credit card, you must meet the minimum annual income requirement of Php 180,000 (equivalent to Php 15,000 monthly) as stated in the BPI Product Data. Prepare your latest Income Tax Return (ITR), recent payslips (3 months), or Certificate of Employment (COE) showing your gross annual income meets or exceeds this threshold. This is the standard requirement across most BPI credit card products.

response.message: I want na mag-apply ng credit card sa BPI. What are the steps to avail yun?
response.translated_message:
Here's the translation:

"I want to apply for a credit card at BPI. What are the steps to get one?"

(Note: "na" is a Tagalog word that is often used to indicate a desire or intention, similar to "want" or "wish". "Mag-apply" is the Tagalog verb for "to apply", and "yun" is a pronoun that refers to the credit card. "Avail" is a more formal or technical term that means "to obtain" or "to get", which is why I translated it to "get one" to maintain the banking/financial context.)

suggestions.suggestion: To apply for a BPI credit card, you must meet the minimum annual income requirement of Php 180,000 (equivalent to Php 15,000 monthly) as stated in the BPI Product Data. Prepare your latest Income Tax Return (ITR), recent payslips (3 months), or Certificate of Employment (COE) showing your gross annual income meets or exceeds this threshold. This is the standard requirement across most BPI credit card products.

For digital banking enthusiasts, the BPI Rewards Card is ideal with its Php 1,550 annual fee and Php 180,000 annual income requirement. It offers BPI Points earning system and comes with both physical and eCredit Card for secure online transactions. If you prefer no annual fee, the BPI eCredit Card is completely free and serves as a companion card for online purchases, perfect for your digital lifestyle.

Based on the latest BPI fee structure, key charges to note: Annual fees vary by card type - BPI Rewards Card at Php 1,550/year, BPI Signature Card at Php 5,500/year, while BPI eCredit Card is free. Cash advance fee is Php 200 per transaction with a 3% monthly finance charge. Foreign transactions incur 1.85% fee (0.85% BPI fee + 1% Mastercard/Visa assessment).

Apply online at www.bpi.com.ph for the fastest processing. You'll need: (1) Completed application form, (2) Valid government-issued ID, (3) Proof of income documents meeting the Php 180,000 annual requirement, (4) Latest utility bill as proof of billing address. The online application portal supports your digital banking preference and provides real-time application status updates.
